ygData.subject: Where is Fabian???
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone know? I stumbled in to Vahal the Vile (sp?) chasing some poor soul to the Stone Bridge and slew-eth him!  So, I dutifully took the troll guts (ewww!)
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone know?

I stumbled in to Vahal the Vile (sp?) chasing some poor soul to the Stone
Bridge and slew-eth him! So, I dutifully took the troll guts (ewww!) back
to the bardette in Qeynos and promptly attacked her! Hey, I was eating some
spaghetti and things just got out of control - what can I say. After I got
ressed back from Gfay, I got some lute strings and a quest to find Fabian.
Anyone know where he is?

Sylly

p.s. Tallies, we you compiling the "easter eggs"?? Bard named Fabian == late
50's early 60's pop/rock singer named Fabian?
